title: Baked sticky toffee pudding with toffee sauce
description: Baking rather than steaming the sticky toffee pudding saves time, and still produces a moist sponge to dish up with the lip-smacking toffee sauce. Serve with ice cream
ingredients: 50g/1¾oz unsalted butter, plus extra for greasing
200g/7oz self-raising flour, plus extra for dusting
